title: Please help me i receive a wrongly bann
body: Hello Riot.I have a problem with my account which consist in a bann for 14 days which I receive wrongly.Please can you verify my last match was played by another ip address.My cousin found my account in the note book when he comes at my birthday there was my name and password.He was gealous because I get platinum 3 and he cant get gold 5 he thinks to play some matchs to troll on my account to can be the same, nobody to receive rewards.Please do something and help me I need my rewards I play all of my games good and I don't flame or play bad I receive a lot of honors and now my cousin worst destroy all my work.

replies.body: Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account" when you get the chance! After you verify that you were the original creator, those agents should be able to help repair any damage they might have done.
ty I put my problem but when they will see it?
I'm not 100% sure of the average response time for EUNE, but NA's is typically less than a day.
